About the Author
Susan Casey is the author of Kids Inventing! A Handbook for Young Inventors and Women Invent! Two Centuries of Discoveries That Have Shaped Our World. She is also a journalist and her articles and photographs have appeared in Fast Company, Women's Sports, Soap Opera Digest, the Los Angeles Times, the San Francisco Chronicle,Inventors Digest, Electrical Contractor and many other publications.
